title: Populate vocabulary database with 3000 GRE words

requirements.text: Populate the backend vocabulary database with 3000 GRE words, including for each word: the word itself, definition, part of speech, example sentence, difficulty level, and category

quotes: the words list is empty. could you please populate the list with 3000 gre words

acceptanceCriteria: Backend contains exactly 3000 GRE vocabulary words
Each word entry includes: word, definition, part of speech, example sentence, difficulty level, and category
Words are accessible via the existing addWord and getWords functions
Flashcard and practice test features work with the populated vocabulary

constraints: Must use the existing VocabularyWord type structure from backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Modifying the frontend UI or components
Adding new backend functions beyond populating existing data
